column1: #text=Grocery shopping can be a stressful event , but if you come prepared then you can usually leave without a headache .
#text=Before we head over to the store we need to make a list of all the items that we need .
#text=Once you arrive at the store if you have a short list make sure to grab a basket .
#text=If you are purchasing a wider variety of items then grab a shopping cart .
#text=I would recommend starting on the outside perimeter of the store , hitting up your dairy , meats , and vegetables .
#text=While you are working your way clockwise or counter-clockwise you can frequent the aisles in the middle to pickup the remainder of items .
#text=Spending a lot of time in the aisles can become frustrating since people are more likely to be in your way .
#text=After you select all the items to purchase , find the shortest checkout line .
#text=Once you are close enough start piling your groceries on the belt , and take out your form of payment .
#text=Once paid , the store will generally bag your groceries for you .
#text=Now you just need to load your car , drive home , and unload all of your bounty !
